text: "Fear of the Dark" is a 1992 song by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden and is the title track from their 9th studio album Fear of the Dark. It was released as a live version of the single in 1993 and went to number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 17 in Ireland and number 6 in Finland. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1994. ==Track listing== ;7" poster bag single ;7" picture disc ;Italy 12" maxi single ;UK CD maxi single ;Italy and The Netherlands CD maxi single Category:1992 songs Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
